497690.name: Furi Original Soundtrack
497690.description:
Furi Original Soundtrack features the music created for Furi by Carpenter Brut, Danger, The Toxic Avenger, Lorn, Scattle, Waveshaper and Kn1ght.
100% original compositions, remastered while conserving each musician's touch.

22 tracks, 93 mn. Includes MP3 and FLAC files.
You'll find the files in you Steam directory upon purchase: ...Steam\steamapps\music\Furi Soundtrack

Track list:
01 - Carpenter Brut - Time to wake up
02 - Danger - 6-24
03 - Carpenter Brut - Enraged
04 - Waveshaper - A picture in motion
05 - Waveshaper - Wisdom of rage
06 - Lorn - Unraveled
07 - Lorn - Set me free
08 - Carpenter Brut - What we fight for
09 - The Toxic Avenger - Make this right
10 - The Toxic Avenger - Make this right - remix
11 - Scattle - Love and madness
12 - Carpenter Brut - You're mine
13 - Kn1ght - A big day
14 - Kn1ght - Something memorable
15 - Waveshaper - A monster
16 - Waveshaper - You are the end
17 - The Toxic Avenger - My only chance
18 - Scattle - Shambles
19 - Danger - 7-53
20 - Danger - 8-02
21 - Danger - 19-06
22 - Danger - 19-07
